23. Registration Windows
23.1. There are three (3) registration windows for the Competition. Each registration window
shall open on a date as communicated by the AFC. The registration window shall close
as follows:
23.1.1. Registration Window 1: for Participating Clubs entering at the Preliminary
Stage or Playoff Stage, fifteen (15) days prior to their first Match in the
Competition;
23.1.2. Registration Window 2: for Participating Clubs entering at the Group Stage,
thirty (30) days prior to their first Match of the Group Stage;
23.1.3. Registration Window 3: for Participating Clubs who qualify for the Quarter
Finals, fifteen (15) days prior to their first Match of the Quarter Finals.

23. Registration Windows
23.1. There are three (3) registration windows for the Competition. Each registration window
shall open on a date as communicated by the AFC. The registration window shall close
as follows:
23.1.1. Registration Window 1: for Participating Clubs entering at the Preliminary
Stage or Playoff Stage, fifteen (15) days prior to their first Match in the
Competition;
23.1.2. Registration Window 2: for Participating Clubs entering at the Group Stage,
thirty (30) days prior to their first Match of the Group Stage;
23.1.3. Registration Window 3: for Participating Clubs who qualify for the Quarter
Finals, fifteen (15) days prior to their first Match of the Quarter Finals.
